markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Underground](/Rules.aspx?ID=630)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 516 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Underground environments consist of caves and natural underground areas. Artificial dungeons and ruins combine underground features with urban features like stairs and walls. Deep underground vaults have some of the same terrain features as mountains, such as chasms and cliffs. The most common disasters underground are collapses.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-631" />

<document level="2" id="rules-632" />

<document level="2" id="rules-633" />

<document level="2" id="rules-634" />

<document level="2" id="rules-635" />
name: Underground
